title: S54-powered 1993 BMW 316i Touring Design Edition
description: 1993 BMW E30 Touring Design Edition S54 engine swap (BMW E46 M3) Location: Montreal, Canada Country of original delivery: Germany Mileage: 236,000 km (146,000 miles) Colour: Daytona Violet Price: Call for Price See links to restoration images and a list of all parts at the bottom of the listing. The car As part of its Private Sales initiative, Petrolicious is proud to offer a unique S54-swapped 1993 BMW E30 Touring Design Edition built to OEM performance and design standards. This meticulously maintained 1993 BMW E30 ‘Wagon’ Design Edition represents a stunning blend of classic design and modern performance, thanks to a comprehensive series of upgrades and extensive refurbishment by its mechanical engineer owner. Producing 338 horsepower from an S54 BMW M3 swap, this 1993 BMW E30 Touring ‘Design Edition’ was meticulously crafted over more than 300 hours. The 1,170 kilograms RWD family wagon now offers a power-to-weight ratio which matches the one of a 991.1 Porsche 911 Carrera, produces a fantastic symphony from its inline-six engine and performance stainless steel exhaust system, and drivers like an absolute charm.   Continue...
